pages.text: Notidanoides is hexanchiiform shark known from Solnhofen, related to modern cow shark. With length reaching 3 m, it had much slenderer body compared to modern relative. Although large and mostly complete specimen exists, it was destroyed during the war, and other than that it is known from a few body fossils and many teeth.
